title: CRedit Maker
description: CRedit Maker helps you to create CRediT (Contributor Roles Taxonomy) statements for your research papers.

title: Rejoinderoo
description: Rejoinderoo creates a rejoinder (response to reviewers) LaTeX document based on a CSV file.

title: Pokédex
description:
Pokédex application developed with Flutter.

title: EXO
description: Run your own AI cluster at home with everyday devices.
